system.description:
You have learned to draw upon the magic of the natural world to bolster your magical knowledge, and you can in turn use this knowledge to improve your capabilities in the wilderness. You gain the following benefits:

  • While in natural surroundings, spells you cast from the Knowledge and Scrying schools have double their normal duration.

  • While in natural surroundings, you always know which way is north, which way to the nearest forest, which way to the nearest community of at least 500 humanoids, how long until sunrise (if it is night) or sunset (if it is day), and the location of the nearest source of potable fresh water.

  • Spells that you cast which deal damage deal additional damage equal to your proficiency bonus when cast on your Studied Adversaries.
